description:
Returns a paginated list of all branch restrictions on the
repository.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the account, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{account UUID}`. An account is either a team or user.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

200.description: A paginated list of branch restrictions

401.description: If the request was not authenticated

403.description: If the authenticated user does not have admin access to the repository

404.description: If the repository does not exist

description: Creates a new branch restriction rule for a repository.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the account, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{account UUID}`. An account is either a team or user.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

201.description: A paginated list of branch restrictions

401.description: If the request was not authenticated

403.description: If the authenticated user does not have admin access to the repository

404.description: If the repository does not exist

description: Deletes an existing branch restriction rule.

parameters.description: This can either be the username or the UUID of the account, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{account UUID}`. An account is either a team or user.
parameters.name: username

parameters.description: This can either be the repository slug or the UUID of the repository, surrounded by curly-braces, for example: `{repository UUID}`.
parameters.name: repo_slug

401.description: If the request was not authenticated

403.description: If the authenticated user does not have admin access to the repository

404.description: If the repository or branch restriction id does not exist

parameters.description: The new version of the existing rule
